iati-activity.title: Supporting localized gov in BF UK_15-07 20140290
iati-activity.description: The proposed project will provide sustainable access to water to 25,800 people in 37 rural communities in 6 Regions in Burkina Faso, and in conjunction with sanitation and hygiene activities, improve overall well-being. The Program Support Unit (PSU, UK) will provide technical guidance and overview

Bureau d'Etudes et de Recherches Appliquées
